verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:21
verses.text: When he had caused the tribe of Benjamin to come near by their families, the family of Matri was taken, and Saul the son of Kish was taken: and when they sought him, he could not be found.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:22
verses.text: Therefore they enquired of the Lord further, if the man should yet come thither. And the Lord answered, Behold, he hath hid himself among the stuff.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 10:23
verses.text: And they ran and fetched him thence: and when he stood among the people, he was higher than any of the people from his shoulders and upward.
